com.bshg.programs:Washer:2.0.0.description: Function block model for Washer functionality of Home Appliances

statusProperties.name: delayedStart
statusProperties.description: If this option is set, the program will be activated but not started until the defined time span elapses.

com.bshg.common:RemoteControlActivationS.description: This status indicates whether the allowance for remote controlling is enabled.

statusProperties.name: currentState
statusProperties.description: true if remote control is activated, false otherwise

com.bshg.common:RemoteStartAllowanceStat.description: This status indicates whether the remote program start is enabled. This can happen due to a programmatic change (only disabling), or manually by the user changing the flag locally on the home appliance, or automatically after a certain duration - usually 24 hours.

statusProperties.name: currentState
statusProperties.description: true if remote start is activated, false otherwise

com.bshg.types.common:OperationState:2.0.description: Enumeration of the Operation state of the home appliance.

literals.name: Inactive
literals.description: Home appliance is switched off or in standby

literals.name: Ready
literals.description: Home appliance is switched on. No program has been activated

literals.name: DelayedStart
literals.description: A program has been activated but has not been started yet if a delayed start has been configured

literals.name: Run
literals.description: A program is currently activated and runs.

literals.name: Pause
literals.description: An activated program has been paused

literals.name: ActionRequired
literals.description: The activated program requires a user interaction

literals.name: Finished
literals.description: The activated program has finished or has been aborted successfully

literals.name: Error
literals.description: The home appliance is in an error state

literals.name: Aborting
literals.description: The activated program is currently aborting

literals.name: Cotton
literals.description: For cleaning cotton or linen clothing with normal to heavy soiling. (Max. load. If Speed Perfect function is selected: 5 kg)

literals.name: EasyCare
literals.description: For washing easy-care laundry made from synthetic or mixed fibres, such as polyamide and polyester. (Max. load: 4.0 kg)

literals.name: Mix
literals.description: For cleaning different fabrics (cottons, synthetic and mixed fibres) in the same laundry load. Suitable for laundry with light to normal soiling. (Max. load: 4.0 kg)

literals.name: DelicatesSilk
literals.description: For cleaning delicate fabrics such as silk, satin and viscose. Reduced spin for optimal fabric care. It is recommended to use a mild detergent. (Max. load: 2.0 kg)

literals.name: Wool
literals.description: For gentle washing of items made from wool, such as cashmere and sheep's wool. Reduced drum movement to prevent felting and shrinking. Particularly gentle, can be used in place of hand-washing. It is recommended to use a detergent specifically for woollens. (Max. load: 2.0 kg)

com.bshg.common:PowerState:2.0.0.description: This setting describes the current power state of the home appliance

literals.name: Present
literals.description: The event occurred and is present.

literals.name: Off
literals.description: The event is off.

literals.name: Confirmed
literals.description: The event has been confirmed by the user.

com.bshg.types.common:DoorState:2.0.0.description: This enumeration describes the state of the door of the BSH home appliance.

literals.name: Open
literals.description: The door of the home appliance is open.

literals.name: Closed
literals.description: The door of the home appliance is closed but not locked.

literals.name: Locked
literals.description: The door of the home appliance is open.

com.bshg.common:OperationState:2.0.0.description: This status describes the operation state of the home appliance.

literals.name: Off
literals.description: The washer will not spin.

literals.name: RPM400
literals.description: The washer will spin with 400 rpm.

literals.name: RPM600
literals.description: The washer will spin with 600 rpm.

literals.name: RPM800
literals.description: The washer will spin with 800 rpm.

literals.name: RPM1000
literals.description: The washer will spin with 1000 rpm.

literals.name: RPM1200
literals.description: The washer will spin with 1200 rpm.

literals.name: RPM1400
literals.description: The washer will spin with 1400 rpm.

literals.name: RPM1600
literals.description: The washer will spin with 1600 rpm.

literals.name: UINo
literals.description: The washer will not spin.

literals.name: UILow
literals.description: The washer will spin with low spin speed.

literals.name: UIMedium
literals.description: The washer will spin with medium spin speed.

literals.name: UIHigh
literals.description: The washer will spin with high spin speed.

com.bshg.types.common:PowerState:2.0.0.description: This setting  describes the current power state of the home appliance.

literals.name: On
literals.description: The home appliance switched to on state

literals.name: Off
literals.description: The home appliance switched to off state

literals.name: Standby
literals.description: The home appliance went to standby mode

com.bshg:WasherWAT286H8SG:2.0.0.description: Information model for BSH Washer WAT286H8SG

literals.name: Cold
literals.description: Cold Water

literals.name: GC20
literals.description: Optimal for 20C washable clothes

literals.name: GC30
literals.description: Optimal for 30C washable clothes

literals.name: GC40
literals.description: Optimal for 40C washable clothes

literals.name: GC50
literals.description: Optimal for 50C washable clothes

literals.name: GC60
literals.description: Optimal for 60C washable clothes

literals.name: GC70
literals.description: Optimal for 70C washable clothes

literals.name: GC80
literals.description: Optimal for 80C washable clothes

literals.name: GC90
literals.description: Optimal for 90C washable clothes

literals.name: UICold
literals.description: Optimal for cold washable clothes

literals.name: UIWarm
literals.description: Optimal for warm washable clothes

literals.name: UIHot
literals.description: Optimal for hot washable clothes

literals.name: UIExtraHot
literals.description: Optimal for extra hot washable clothes

com.bshg.common:LocalControlState:2.0.0.description: This status indicates whether the home appliance is currently manually controlled by the user operating the home appliance, e.g. opening the door or pressing a button. After a few seconds without user intervention this flag is reverted and an appropriate event is sent.

statusProperties.name: currentState
statusProperties.description: true if the home appliance is currently operated locally, false otherwise

com.bshg.common:DoorState:2.0.0.description: This status describes the state of the door of the home appliance. A change of that status is either triggered by the user operating the home appliance locally (i.e. opening/closing door) or automatically by the home appliance (i.e. locking the door)
